alert.note: Alert for Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 12:32PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Payette, south central Washington and northeastern Malheur Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 132 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vale, or 12 miles southwest of Ontario, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ontario, Fruitland and Moores Hollow around 200 PM MDT. Payette, Weiser and Annex around 210 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
